A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The peculiarity starts when the sky turns red during the full moon. The family just wants to get the cat to move. They and their friends should watch TV, and they are kidnapped by a man with a video camera. Then a giant evil cat approaches and destroys everything.
